headline: Assessing Whether Gen Digital (GEN) Looks Undervalued After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: With no single headline event driving attention to Gen Digital (GEN) today, the focus for investors is on how its current share price of US$22.57 lines up with recent returns and fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Gen Digital. Recent moves have been mixed, with a 1 day share price return of 1.01% decline and a 30 day share price return of 5.92% decline. At the same time, the 3 year total shareholder return of 24.80% and 5 year total shareholder return of 23.98% point to a longer term...
